src:
Real Madrid Menang Besar, Rodrygo Bungkus Hattrick Sekaligus Bikin Rekor
07 Nov 2019, 05:40 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Pemain muda Real Madrid, Rodrygo Goes, menuliskan namanya pada buku rekor Liga Champions usai menjebol gawang Galatasaray, Kamis (7/11/2019) dini hari WIB. Bocah Brasil ini terbukti sebagai pembelian jitu Madrid.
Bermain di Santiago Bernabeu, Madrid tampil luar biasa untuk memetik kemenangan 6-0 pada matchday 4 Grup A. Rodrygo menyumbang separuh dari enam gol tersebut, bocah 18 tahun ini mencetak hattrick.
Hattrick itu luar biasa, tapi yang tak kalah penting adalah dua gol pertama Rodrygo. Dia mencetak gol hanya empat menit setelah pertandingan dimulai - gol pertama Rodrygo di UCL - lalu tak butuh waktu lama untuk menambah koleksinya.

Baca selengkapnya di bawah ini ya, Bolaneters!
text:
Real Madrid Wins Big, Rodrygo Wrap Hattrick At Once Make A Record
Nov 7, 2019, 05:40 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Real Madrid young player, Rodrygo Goes, wrote his name on the Champions League record book after breaking down Galatasaray goal on Thursday (11/07/2019) early morning hrs. This Brazilian boy proved to be a surefire purchase of Madrid.
Playing at the Santiago Bernabeu, Madrid performed superbly to win 6-0 on Matchday 4 Group A. Rodrygo contributed half of the six goals, this 18-year-old boy scored a hat trick.
The hat trick was incredible, but what was just as important was Rodrygo's first two goals. He scored just four minutes after the match began - Rodrygo's first goal at UCL - then it didn't take long to add to his collection.

Read below, Bolaneters!
